column2: Select a random number of players at the table. If all of them are on the same team their identities are revealed to all disciplinary committee members.
A chosen player's identity is revealed to the entire table.
You kick a player out of the game. You bypass Anatole's alibi and win should he be chosen.
Steal a card from a player.
Does nothing.
Nobody will be able to draw cards for the next two turns except for Miller and revealed disciplinary members.
Remove a player from school for the rest of the day and tomorrow.
Currency for Pay-to-Win Cards.
Skip the next player's turn.
All bombs are defused and discarded. Draw a card for every bomb defused.
You may donate any amount of cards to a chosen player
End the day early.
Each player is allowed the option to skip school for the rest of the day.
You cannot play cards when this card is given to you by Krishna.
All players cannot play cards for two days.
Your identity is revealed to the entire table when drawn.
All disciplinary commitee members are revealed to non disciplinary commitee members.
If called on by Toby then the player refuses to reveal themselves AND they are immune to being called on for 3 turns.
Trading is banned for the day.
All cards being traded must be revealed for a day.
You are removed from the game if you do not trade this card by the end of the next day.
Each player draws a new identity excluding Toby.
If called on by Toby then the player is removed from school for two days. Their identity is safe and Toby is also removed from the game for two days.
Class-specific abilities are banned for two days.
Force a player to discard a random card.
Swap hands with another player.
If Anatole has 3 Yapstones then he may purchase a History Paper.
